mapper.select: select t2.*, ifnull(t2.src_sharding_num, 1) as src_sharding_num from ( select * from dev_job_publish_record where publish_status = 2 and del = 0 and job_id = #{jobId} and environment = #{env} and (job_type_code = 'DI_BATCH' or job_type_code = 'DI_BATCH') ) as t1 join dev_job_content_di as t2 on t1.job_content_id = t2.id
